title: Diamond-Accented Gold Kangan Bangles: Contemporary Sparkle
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut diamonds of VS clarity
features: Sleek, minimalist design with alternating diamond placements. High polish finish, accentuating the gold's natural luster. The diamonds are set in a prong setting.
colors: Yellow Gold with brilliant white diamonds
occasions: and festive occasions. Can be paired with both traditional sarees and contemporary outfits. Perfect for everyday modern style.
description: A modern take on a traditional style, these bangles blend sophistication with simplicity. High-quality diamonds add brilliance and sparkle. The smooth finish provides a comfortable fit for all-day wear. Makes a wonderful gift!
